word:
The work of the canvasser is a very important work. Thus the silent messengers of truth are placed in the homes of the people. As God blesses the minister and the evangelist in their earnest efforts to place the truth before the people, so He will bless the faithful canvasser.--Ms 36, 1900. 

Ellen G. White Estate Washington, D. C. May 12, 1988. Entire Ms.
